page.title: 06NEW HOUSING IN CLOWNE
page.content: FROM 1970 CLOWNE HAS SEEN QUITE RAPID GROWTH WITH THE DEVELOPEMENT OF A NUMBER OF PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATES.THE MAIN REASON FOR THIS BEING THE OPENING OF THE M1 MOTORWAY IN 1970 WHICH IN TERMS OF JOURNEY TIME BROUGHT CLOWNE MUCH CLOSER TO SHEFFIELD. 6 ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT SINCE 1970 THESE ARE: 1.ON BRAMLYN CLOSE CLOSE TO THE SECONDARY SCHOOL 43 MAINLY SEMI-DETATCHED HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT. 2.ALSO CLOSE TO THE SECONDARY SCHOOL 55 MAINLY DETATCHED BUNGALOWS HAVE BEEN BUILT ON CHESTNUT DRIVE. 3.ON ROMELEY CRESCENT 45 HOMES HAVE BEEN BUILT NEAR THE VILLAGE CENTRE. 4,5.IN THE EASTERN PART OF THE VILLAGE 2 ESTATES OF 65 AND 76 DETACHED BUNGALOWS HAVE BEEN BUILT. 6.THE LARGEST ESTATE OF 316 HOMES HAS BEEN BUILT NEAR ST.JOHNS CHURCH.
